channel.title: International News - Top 10
channel.description: Daily curated top 10 international news headlines

item.title: Israel and Lebanon tensions rise near border
item.description: Clashes reported along the Israel-Lebanon border as both sides exchange fire.

item.title: US pushes for ceasefire in Gaza conflict
item.description: Washington calls for immediate halt to hostilities as Gaza faces humanitarian crisis.

item.title: UN warns of climate tipping points
item.description: UN scientists warn the world is approaching irreversible climate tipping points.

item.title: China and US hold high-level trade talks
item.description: Negotiators from China and the US met in Beijing to ease trade tensions.

item.title: Russia accused of new cyberattacks on Europe
item.description: Several European governments report large-scale cyber intrusions traced to Russian actors.

item.title: India lands new spacecraft on the Moon
item.description: India’s space agency successfully lands a rover on the Moon’s south pole.

item.title: French farmers protest in Paris
item.description: Farmers block roads in Paris demanding subsidies and relief from fuel prices.

item.title: UK government faces crisis over budget cuts
item.description: The Prime Minister faces backlash after deep spending cuts spark nationwide protests.

item.title: Hurricane threatens Florida coast
item.description: A powerful hurricane is approaching Florida with winds over 200 km/h.

item.title: Germany unveils renewable energy plan
item.description: Germany announces major investment in wind and solar energy to cut carbon emissions.
